00001 /**
00002  * \file Gravity.cpp
00003  * \brief Command line utility for evaluating gravity fields
00004  *
00005  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2011) <charles@karney.com> and licensed under
00006  * the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00007  * http://geographiclib.sourceforge.net/
00008  *
00009  * Compile and link with
00010  *   g++ -g -O3 -I../include -I../man -o Gravity \
00011  *       Gravity.cpp \
00012  *       ../src/CircularEngine.cpp \
00013  *       ../src/DMS.cpp \
00014  *       ../src/Geocentric.cpp \
00015  *       ../src/GravityCircle.cpp \
00016  *       ../src/GravityModel.cpp \
00017  *       ../src/NormalGravity.cpp \
00018  *       ../src/SphericalEngine.cpp \
00019  *       ../src/Utility.cpp
00020  *
00021  * See the <a href="Gravity.1.html">man page</a> for usage
00022  * information.
00023  **********************************************************************/
00024 
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 #include <string>
00027 #include <sstream>
00028 #include <fstream>
00029 #include <GeographicLib/GravityModel.hpp>
00030 #include <GeographicLib/GravityCircle.hpp>
00031 #include <GeographicLib/DMS.hpp>
00032 #include <GeographicLib/Utility.hpp>
00033 
00034 #include "Gravity.usage"
00035 
00036 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00037   try {
00038     using namespace GeographicLib;
00039     typedef Math::real real;
00040     bool verbose = false;
00041     std::string dir;
00042     std::string model = GravityModel::DefaultGravityName();
00043     std::string istring, ifile, ofile;
00044     real lat = 0, h = 0;
00045     bool circle = false;
00046     int prec = -1;
00047     enum {
00048       GRAVITY = 0,
00049       DISTURBANCE = 1,
00050       ANOMALY = 2,
00051       UNDULATION = 3,
00052     };
00053     unsigned mode = GRAVITY;
00054     for (int m = 1; m < argc; ++m) {
00055       std::string arg(argv[m]);
00056       if (arg == "-n") {
00057         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00058         model = argv[m];
00059       } else if (arg == "-d") {
00060         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00061         dir = argv[m];
00062       } else if (arg == "-G")
00063         mode = GRAVITY;
00064       else if (arg == "-D")
00065         mode = DISTURBANCE;
00066       else if (arg == "-A")
00067         mode = ANOMALY;
00068       else if (arg == "-H")
00069         mode = UNDULATION;
00070       else if (arg == "-c") {
00071         if (m + 2 >= argc) return usage(1, true);
00072         try {
00073           DMS::flag ind;
00074           lat = DMS::Decode(std::string(argv[++m]), ind);
00075           if (ind == DMS::LONGITUDE)
00076             throw GeographicErr("Bad hemisphere letter on latitude");
00077           if (!(std::abs(lat) <= 90))
00078             throw GeographicErr("Latitude not in [-90d, 90d]");
00079           h =  Utility::num<real>(std::string(argv[++m]));
00080           circle = true;
00081         }
00082         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00083           std::cerr << "Error decoding argument of " << arg << ": "
00084                     << e.what() << "\n";
00085           return 1;
00086         }
00087       } else if (arg == "-p") {
00088         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00089         try {
00090           prec = Utility::num<int>(std::string(argv[m]));
00091         }
00092         catch (const std::exception&) {
00093           std::cerr << "Precision " << argv[m] << " is not a number\n";
00094           return 1;
00095         }
00096       } else if (arg == "-v")
00097         verbose = true;
00098       else if (arg == "--input-string") {
00099         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00100         istring = argv[m];
00101       } else if (arg == "--input-file") {
00102         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00103         ifile = argv[m];
00104       } else if (arg == "--output-file") {
00105         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00106         ofile = argv[m];
00107       } else if (arg == "--version") {
00108         std::cout
00109           << argv[0]
00110           << ": $Id: fe8569b6e279ccef9b0576ef502dbc7537e82396 $\n"
00111           << "GeographicLib version " << GEOGRAPHICLIB_VERSION_STRING << "\n";
00112         return 0;
00113       } else {
00114         int retval = usage(!(arg == "-h" || arg == "--help"), arg != "--help");
00115         if (arg == "-h")
00116           std::cout<< "\nDefault gravity path = \""
00117                    << GravityModel::DefaultGravityPath()
00118                    << "\"\nDefault gravity name = \""
00119                    << GravityModel::DefaultGravityName()
00120                    << "\"\n";
00121         return retval;
00122       }
00123     }
00124 
00125     if (!ifile.empty() && !istring.empty()) {
00126       std::cerr << "Cannot specify --input-string and --input-file together\n";
00127       return 1;
00128     }
00129     if (ifile == "-") ifile.clear();
00130     std::ifstream infile;
00131     std::istringstream instring;
00132     if (!ifile.empty()) {
00133       infile.open(ifile.c_str());
00134       if (!infile.is_open()) {
00135         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ifile << " for reading\n";
00136         return 1;
00137       }
00138     } else if (!istring.empty()) {
00139       std::string::size_type m = 0;
00140       while (true) {
00141         m = istring.find(';', m);
00142         if (m == std::string::npos)
00143           break;
00144         istring[m] = '\n';
00145       }
00146       instring.str(istring);
00147     }
00148     std::istream* input = !ifile.empty() ? &infile :
00149       (!istring.empty() ? &instring : &std::cin);
00150 
00151     std::ofstream outfile;
00152     if (ofile == "-") ofile.clear();
00153     if (!ofile.empty()) {
00154       outfile.open(ofile.c_str());
00155       if (!outfile.is_open()) {
00156         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ofile << " for writing\n";
00157         return 1;
00158       }
00159     }
00160     std::ostream* output = !ofile.empty() ? &outfile : &std::cout;
00161 
00162     switch (mode) {
00163     case GRAVITY:
00164       prec = std::min(16, prec < 0 ? 5 : prec);
00165       break;
00166     case DISTURBANCE:
00167     case ANOMALY:
00168       prec = std::min(14, prec < 0 ? 3 : prec);
00169       break;
00170     case UNDULATION:
00171     default:
00172       prec = std::min(12, prec < 0 ? 4 : prec);
00173       break;
00174     }
00175     int retval = 0;
00176     try {
00177       const GravityModel g(model, dir);
00178       if (circle) {
00179         if (!Math::isfinite<real>(h))
00180           throw GeographicErr("Bad height");
00181         else if (mode == UNDULATION && h != 0)
00182           throw GeographicErr("Height should be zero for geoid undulations");
00183       }
00184       if (verbose) {
00185         std::cerr << "Gravity file: " << g.GravityFile()      << "\n"
00186                   << "Name: "         << g.GravityModelName() << "\n"
00187                   << "Description: "  << g.Description()      << "\n"
00188                   << "Date & Time: "  << g.DateTime()         << "\n";
00189       }
00190       unsigned mask = (mode == GRAVITY ? GravityModel::GRAVITY :
00191                        (mode == DISTURBANCE ? GravityModel::DISTURBANCE :
00192                         (mode == ANOMALY ? GravityModel::SPHERICAL_ANOMALY :
00193                          GravityModel::GEOID_HEIGHT))); // mode == UNDULATION
00194       const GravityCircle c(circle ? g.Circle(lat, h, mask) : GravityCircle());
00195       std::string s, stra, strb;
00196       while (std::getline(*input, s)) {
00197         try {
00198           std::istringstream str(s);
00199           real lon;
00200           if (circle) {
00201             if (!(str >> strb))
00202               throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00203             DMS::flag ind;
00204             lon = DMS::Decode(strb, ind);
00205             if (ind == DMS::LATITUDE)
00206               throw GeographicErr("Bad hemisphere letter on " + strb);
00207             if (lon < -180 || lon > 360)
00208               throw GeographicErr("Longitude " + strb + "not in [-180d, 360d]");
00209           } else {
00210             if (!(str >> stra >> strb))
00211               throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00212             DMS::DecodeLatLon(stra, strb, lat, lon);
00213             h = 0;
00214             if (!(str >> h))    // h is optional
00215               str.clear();
00216             if (mode == UNDULATION && h != 0)
00217                 throw GeographicErr("Height must be zero for geoid heights");
00218           }
00219           if (str >> stra)
00220             throw GeographicErr("Extra junk in input: " + s);
00221           switch (mode) {
00222           case GRAVITY:
00223             {
00224               real gx, gy, gz;
00225               if (circle) {
00226                 c.Gravity(lon, gx, gy, gz);
00227               } else {
00228                 g.Gravity(lat, lon, h, gx, gy, gz);
00229               }
00230               *output << Utility::str<real>(gx, prec) << " "
00231                       << Utility::str<real>(gy, prec) << " "
00232                       << Utility::str<real>(gz, prec) << "\n";
00233             }
00234             break;
00235           case DISTURBANCE:
00236             {
00237               real deltax, deltay, deltaz;
00238               if (circle) {
00239                 c.Disturbance(lon, deltax, deltay, deltaz);
00240               } else {
00241                 g.Disturbance(lat, lon, h, deltax, deltay, deltaz);
00242               }
00243               // Convert to mGals
00244               *output << Utility::str<real>(deltax * 1e5, prec) << " "
00245                       << Utility::str<real>(deltay * 1e5, prec) << " "
00246                       << Utility::str<real>(deltaz * 1e5, prec) << "\n";
00247             }
00248             break;
00249           case ANOMALY:
00250             {
00251               real Dg01, xi, eta;
00252               if (circle)
00253                 c.SphericalAnomaly(lon, Dg01, xi, eta);
00254               else
00255                 g.SphericalAnomaly(lat, lon, h, Dg01, xi, eta);
00256               Dg01 *= 1e5;      // Convert to mGals
00257               xi *= 3600;       // Convert to arcsecs
00258               eta *= 3600;
00259               *output << Utility::str<real>(Dg01, prec) << " "
00260                       << Utility::str<real>(xi, prec) << " "
00261                       << Utility::str<real>(eta, prec) << "\n";
00262             }
00263             break;
00264           case UNDULATION:
00265           default:
00266             {
00267               real N = circle ? c.GeoidHeight(lon) : g.GeoidHeight(lat, lon);
00268               *output << Utility::str<real>(N, prec) << "\n";
00269             }
00270             break;
00271           }
00272         }
00273         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00274           *output << "ERROR: " << e.what() << "\n";
00275           retval = 1;
00276         }
00277       }
00278     }
00279     catch (const std::exception& e) {
00280       std::cerr << "Error reading " << model << ": " << e.what() << "\n";
00281       retval = 1;
00282     }
00283     return retval;
00284   }
00285   catch (const std::exception& e) {
00286     std::cerr << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << "\n";
00287     return 1;
00288   }
00289   catch (...) {
00290     std::cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n";
00291     return 1;
00292   }
00293 }
